Bomb - Class in gameplay
Bomb class deals with explosions and Player scoring, and contains all attributes required for a bomb object.
Bomb(Grid) - Constructor for class gameplay.Bomb
Constructor that initializes a Bomb object which initializes all the attributes pertaining to bombs.
Bomb(Grid, Enemy, Player) - Constructor for class gameplay.Bomb
Constructor that initializes a Bomb object which initializes all the attributes pertaining to bombs, initializes the score list and loads the bomb's image.

Brick - Class in gameplay
This class initializes the brick game objects' positions.
